keys: E4: Actividades de Economía. Hoja de trabajo
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4744</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transport</string>
            <string language="es">Transporte</string>
            <string language="ga">Iompar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transporte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasporto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Simple worksheet outlining the different modes of transport relevant to geography. Students should fill in the advantages and disadvantages of each.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo sencilla que describe los diferentes medios de transporte relevantes para la geografía. Los estudiantes deberían completarla indicando las ventajas y desventajas de cada uno de estos medios.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre simplí a imlíníonn na modhanna taistil difriúla a bhaineann le tíreolaíocht. Ba cheart do dhaltaí buntáistí agus míbhuntáistí gach ceann a líonadh isteach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía</string>
            <string language="ga">Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">E4: Economic Activities</string>
            <string language="es">E4: Actividades de Economía. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">E4: Gníomhaíochtaí Eacnamaíocha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfacher Bogen, der die unterschiedlichen Modi 
des Transportes relevant zur Geographie umreißt. Kursteilnehmer
sollten die Vorteile und die Nachteile von jedem ausfüllen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau simple traçant les grandes lignes des 
différents modes du transport concernant la géographie. Les 
étudiants devraient compléter les avantages et les inconvénients de
chacun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha simples que esboça as modalidades 
diferentes do transporte relevantes à geografia. Os estudantes 
devem preencher as vantagens e as desvantagens de cada um.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro semplice che descrive i modi 
differenti di trasporto relativi a geografia. Gli allievi 
dovrebbero riempire i vantaggi e gli svantaggi di ciascuno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλό φύλλο εργασίας που περιγράφει τους διαφορετικούς
τρόπους μεταφοράς σχετικούς με τη γεωγραφία. Οι σπουδαστές 
πρέπει να συμπληρώσουν τα πλεονεκτήματα και τα μειονεκτήματα κάθε
ένα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">E4: Wirtschaftsleben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">E4 : Activités Économiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E4: Atividades Econômicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">E4: Attività Economiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">E4: Οικονομικές δραστηριότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
